sourcesContent:
import "../styles/DetailedForecast.scss" import { useSelector } from "react-redux" const DetailedForecast = (props) => { const currentTime = state => state.currentTime; const cityCurrentTime = useSelector(currentTime); const forecastData = props.forecast.data.find( element => element.dt === cityCurrentTime); const allWeatherItems = forecastData.weather.map( element => { return
{element.main}
} ) return (
{allWeatherItems}
{"Temperature"}
{forecastData.main.temp}
{"Ressenti"}
{forecastData.main.feels_like}
{"Pression Atmosphérique"}
{forecastData.main.grnd_level}
{"Humidité"}
{forecastData.main.humidity}
{"Couverture nuageuse"}
{forecastData.clouds.all}
) } export default DetailedForecast
